title: Handle Rental Car Coverage on a Claim
description: A customer's car is in the shop for a covered repair, and they need to arrange for a rental car under their policy.

tasks.description: Identify the customer and their open claim, and verify they have rental reimbursement coverage.
tasks.expected_outcome: The adjuster confirms the customer has rental coverage with a limit of $30/day.

tasks.description: Explain the coverage limits to the customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: The adjuster clearly explains the daily limit and maximum number of days.

tasks.description: Set up a direct billing arrangement with a network rental car company.
tasks.expected_outcome: The adjuster makes a reservation for the customer and sets up direct billing.
